text: David L. Cohen (born 1955) is an American businessman, attorney and lobbyist. He was the United States Ambassador to Canada from 2021 until 2025. He was the senior advisor to the CEO of Comcast Corporation. Until January 1, 2020, he was senior executive vice president and chief lobbyist for Comcast. In July 2021, President Joe Biden nominated Cohen as the United States Ambassador to Canada. Cohen was confirmed by the U.S. Senate in a voice vote on November 2, 2021.https://twitter.com/SenatePPG/status/1455663923575902209 ==References== Category:Living people Category:1955 births Category:Lawyers from Philadelphia Category:American lobbyists Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Canada Category:Lawyers from New York City
title: David L. Cohen
